Member Function Documentation

WString AlphaCoding::DecodeAlphaField (  const UINT8 *  buffer,
const INT  len,
const INT  prealloclen = 0
)  [static]
 

Decodes a byte buffer coded with GSM 11.11 Annex B and returns a wstring object. prealloclen defines the length of the pre allocated string buffer.

void AlphaCoding::EnableUsagePureUcs2Encoding (  BOOLEAN  enable = TRUE  )  [static]
 

Controls if only UCS2 coding scheme 0x80 shall be used for encoding unicode characters. The encoding of 7-bit characters remain unchanged from this setting. This setting influences the behaviour of GetCodedAlphaFieldLen and EncodeAlphaField methods, by meaning it is garantueed that UCS2 scheme 0x81 and 0x82 are not taken into account. The default value is FALSE, this means 0x81 and 0x82 are used when not calling this method.

BOOLEAN AlphaCoding::EncodeAlphaField (  const WString &  str,
UINT8 *  buffer,
INT  len,
INT &  strlen,
INT &  efflen
)  [static]
 

BOOLEAN AlphaCoding::EncodeAlphaField (  const WString &  str,
UINT8 *  buffer,
INT  len
)  [static]
 

Fills a byte buffer in an optimal way dependend of the content of the wstring object. All four coding schemes might be used for coding the unicode string dependend of the setting of EnableUsagePureUcs2Encoding method.

INT AlphaCoding::GetCodedAlphaFieldLen (  const WString &  wstr  )  [static]
 

Retrieves the alpha coded length of a given Unicode string, dependend of the setting of EnableUsagePureUcs2Encoding method.
